name: Puzzled Towers
description:
Puzzled Towers is a first person tower defense game with dynamic real time ai. Upon entering the gridwork, players will be given a lump sum of money to buy their first tower! Make sure you pick wisely stop the enemies from advancing to the end portal. Each tower that a player places down on the grid will allow the AI to choose a better path to the end portal. However, be warned, blocking the portal exit directly will cause a large amount of damage to your towers which will set players back big time. When players are out of money they have the option to roam around the map and explore the surrounding area.If the end portal teleports too many AI, the game is over.



*Customizable Pathing
*20+ Upgradable Towers
*Anti-Path Blocking Countermeasures
*Smart AI
*1000 Rounds
*First Person
